modName: Town Guard Companions Guild Dialog Fix
summary: This mod removes a line of dialog where a town guard asks you if you fetch mead for the members of the Companions Guild.
descriptionHtml:
After you join the Companions Guild, town guards will frequently ask you if you fetch the mead for the other guild members. This question persists no matter what your rank in the guild is. The frequency of the question is also fairly high. This mod removes this line of dialog from the game.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8414]This mod is also available at the Steam Workshop[/url].
author: The Exploder
